name: Digital Torque Wrench 1/2" Drive 3.8-250.8FT.LB (5-340Nm),Electronic Torque Wrench ±1% High Accuracy,5 Units LCD with Buzzer & LED Alerts For Car Bike Moto Truck
short_description: 1.PRO-GRADE PRECISION & CERTIFIED ACCURACY Engineered with ±1% precision to meet ISO , ASME B, and GB/T standards, this torque wrench digital 1/2 drive includes a factory calibration certificate for professional-grade reliability in critical applications.

2.SMART MULTI-UNIT DISPLAY & REAL-TIME TRACKING The digital torque wrench lets you switch effortlessly between 5 units (lb.ft, lb.in, N.m, kg.cm, kg.m) on its backlit LCD screen. Real-time tracking mode eliminates guesswork during tightening, ensuring precise torque control.

3.AUDIBLE & VISUAL FEEDBACK SYSTEM This advanced torque wrench features progressive buzzer alerts that increase in intensity as target torque nears, followed by continuous beeping and sequential LED lights upon achievement—providing clear confirmation without visual distraction.

4.HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION & ERGONOMIC DESIGN Built for durability, this digital torque wrench offers a 3.8-250.8 lb.ft (5.1-340N.m) torque range, impact-resistant housing, and ergonomic grip. Ideal for workshops, industrial settings, or heavy-duty projects.

5.INTUITIVE CONTROLS & DATA LOGGING Operate the electronic torque wrench 1/2 drive easily: Short-press C to power on, long-press to off; P/T toggles Peak/Tracking modes; U switches units; use ▲/▼ to select presets P1-P9, press M to confirm, set torque value and press M again to save; during operation, press M to instantly store data (500-group capacity); long-press M for memory management: press U to select "Delete All" or "Delete Single", then confirm with M.

This wrench is designed for versatility, making it ideal for automotive and aircraft maintenance, as well as for home projects. [Multi-scenario Use] The SUZUME digital torque wrench 3/8 drive supports four units of measurement (Nm, ft-lb, in-lb, kg-cm), making it versatile for various mechanical tasks like automotive maintenance, machinery manufacturing, and aerospace.
